channel.title: external on TrueCommand Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in external on TrueCommand Documentation

item.title: external/submit_alerts
item.description: Namespace Name Admin Only Log Summary Generates Event Version Added external submit_alerts N/A N/A yes 1.1 Description API hook for external systems to submit alert notices to TrueCommand. This requires that the external system use a valid system auth token to submit the API call over HTTP. Note: This works for both “external” types of systems as well as FreeNAS/TrueNAS systems.

item.title: external/submit_stats
item.description: Namespace Name Admin Only Log Summary Generates Event Version Added external submit_stats N/A N/A yes 1.1 Description API hook for external systems to submit statistics to TrueCommand. This requires that the external system use a valid system auth token to submit the API call over HTTP. Note: This works for both “external” types of systems as well as FreeNAS/TrueNAS systems. It just needs a valid auth token which associates the API request with a currently-registered system.
